name: The Zane Project: Universal Installer
short_description: Zane is A Multi-Distribution installer -Browser Plug-in/Player. It creates a Native DEB,RPM, TGZ,EXE,TAR.GZ, etc, Client-Side, INSIDE the Web Browser, through the Plug-in. The Player installs .ZANi files, which are the Install Files for this Amazing Feat
